system.damageOrEffect: Gain Blast (5) and Concussive (5) Qualities. In addition to normal effects anyone within Blast Radius must make -20 Strength Test or be thrown 1d5 metres from blast and knocked prone.

Damage/Effect: Gain Blast (5) and Concussive (5) Qualities. In addition to normal effects anyone within Blast Radius must make -20 Strength Test or be thrown 1d5 metres from blast and knocked prone.

Qualities: Blast (5), Concussive (5)
